1.content:
It was a normal day at the Fairy Tail Guild Hall. The wizards were either guzzling down beer, picking fights, or just chatting with each other.

One wizard was looking at the Request board and spotted a translation request and decided to check it out.
1.title: The Magic begins

11.content:
Natsu decided to check out the request and smiled, "Ha this should be easy we just need to translate this I'm sure we can figure it out easily! Lucy is really smart after all! She's always reading!"

Happy said, "Aye sir! Let's bring it over to her!"

The two approached Lucy who was chatting with Levy.

Natsu said, "Hey Luce! We found an easy job! It's just a translation one. I bet you can figure it out!"

Lucy said, "What?! A translation job! No way Natsu! Did you forget what happened last time?"

Wendy approached the group and asked, "What happened last time?"

Lucy said, "We ended up switching bodies with each other. We barley managed to get back to our own body last time."

Natsu said, "Come on the chances are slim it'll happen again! Let's go for it pays really well!"

Lucy said, "Not happening Natsu."

Natsu said, "Fine I'll figure it out myself then all the reward will be mine."

He began to read it, "O, oi kathodigoúmenes neráides mas dínoun mia néa ápopsi tis zoís. Antalláxte mas makriá kai dóste mas mia néa ápopsi. antístrofa"

Lucy tried to stop him but it was too late as they were blinded by a flash of light that filled the guild hall.

Who was swapped?
11.title: Natsu

111.content: The poor Celestial wizard and Fire Dragon have fallen victim to the spell. What was swapped?
111.title: Lucy and Natsu

1111.content: The two fell victim to the body swap spell but who did they swap with?
1111.title: Body

11112.content: Did they swap with the little sky dragon that could and the Future seeing Exceed or did they swap with the first master and solid script mage?
11112.title: Other Fairy Tail members

choices: Lucy to Mavis, Natsu to Levy
Lucy to Levy, Natsu to Mavis
111122.title: Mavis and Levy

choices: The paper was no longer there
1111221.content:
When the light died down Lucy was the first to recover and see what had happened. She gasped as she looked around the guild hall everything seemed much bigger than before. A lock of platinum blonde hair fell into her face. She grabbed a lock of hair and moved it out of her face.

She said, "What the!? Why do I look like the first master?" She covered her mouth, "I event sound like her too!"

She turned to face Natsu who seemed to have snapped out of shock.

'Natsu' said, "Ahhh! I'm Natsu! How did this happen? I wasn't touching the paper! My voice is so much deeper now!"

Lucy asked, "Who are you in Natsu's body?"

Natsu said, "I'm Levy!"

Lucy said, "Wait but does that mean?"

She looked to her fellow bookworm. Who seemed to be grinning goofily.

Levy's body said, "Whoa! I'm Levy! This feels so weird! I wonder can I use your magic now?"

Natsu in Levy's body tried to use her solid script magic, "Solid Script Fire!" They spelt out the word fire but nothing happened.

Natsu said, "Ah man! This didn't work! I know I spelt it right!" He was really angry you could hear it in Levy's voice. Suddenly fire appeared around Levy's fist.

Levy said, "What the heck!? Is that your magic?"

Natsu looked down at his new hand surrounded by fire and grinned. "let's see! I'm coming for ya Levy! Fire Dragon Iron fist!" He aimed a punch at his old body who quickly reacted, "Solid Script Water!" A floating water script appeared as the attack hit landing but failing to burn.

Natsu said, "This is awesome! We still have our own magic!"

Lucy said angrily, "Natsu this isn't funny! We have to switch back!"

Levy said, "I agree with Lucy. This is interesting but I'd like my own body back."

She turned to where the paper had been.
1111221.title: Lucy to Mavis, Natsu to Levy

info.brief_description: A strange new translation request appears on Fairy Tail's request boardm
info.description:
Here is my first attempt at an interactive story. This is partially based on the changling episode of Fairy Tail. A new translation request appears on the request board and one wizard decides to attempt it. This changling spell is a bit different from before. It can swap several different things.

Standard Body Swap: Two wizards swap bodies at random.
Body part swap: Two wizards swap a body part at random
Life Swap: Two characters switch lives
-body and life Swap
- Only life Swap: The wizard keeps their own body but are percieved as the other

Age Swap: Wizards swap ages

Personality swap: Wizards switch personality

Magic swap: Two wizards swap magic
